extension.summary: SoundCloud е платформа за разпространяване на аудио.
SoundCloud is an online audio distribution platform.
SoundCloud est une plateforme de streaming audio en ligne.
סאונדקלאוד הוא פלטפורמת הפצת אודיו באינטרנט.
SoundCloud is een online audio distributie platform.
extension.description: SoundCloud е платформа за разпространение на аудио, която позволява на потребителите да качват, записват, представят и споделят звуците създадени от тях.
SoundCloud is an online audio distribution platform that enables its users to upload, record, promote and share their originally-created sounds.
Soundcloud ist ein Online-Audio-Vertriebsplattform. Benutzer können ihre ursprünglich erstelle Music hochladen, aufnehmen und unter weiteren Benutzern teilen.
SoundCloud est une plateforme de streaming audio en ligne qui permet aux utilisateurs d'envoyer, d'enregistrer, de promouvoir et partager leurs créations audio originales.
סאונדקלאוד הוא פלטפורמה הפצת אודיו מקוונת המאפשרת למשתמשים שלה להעלות, להקליט, לקדם ולשתף את היצירות שלהם.
SoundCloud is een online audio distributie platform dat gebruikers in staat stelt om hun eigen muziekcreaties te uploaden, opnemen, promoten en te delen.

Multi-emulator front-end for Kodi scalable to collections of thousands of ROMs. Includes offline scrapers for MAME and No-Intro ROM sets and also supports scrapping ROM metadata and artwork online. ROM auditing for No-Intro ROMs using No-Intro XML DATs. Launching of games and standalone applications is also available.

extension.summary: Lancer n'importer quelle application depuis Kodi.
extension.description: Advanced Launcher erlaubt das Starten beliebiger Linux, Windows und OS X Anwendungen (mit oder ohne Kommandozeile) direkt aus der Kodi Oberfläche. Advanced Launcher erlaubt weiterhin das Editieren, Herunterladen und Verwalten der Metadaten (Informationen und Bilder) für diese Anwendungen aus dem Internet.

Advanced Launcher allows you to start any Linux, Windows and OS X applications (with command line support or not) directly from the Kodi GUI. Advanced Launcher also give you the possibility to edit, download (from Internet resources) and manage all the meta-data (informations and images) related to these applications.

Advanced Launcher permet de lancer toutes les applications Linux, Windows and OS X (avec support des lignes de commandes ou non) directement depuis l'interface de Kodi. Advanced Launcher offre également la possibilité de modifier, télécharger (depuis les ressoures web) et de gérer toues les meta-donées (informations et images) relatives à ces applications.
Advanced Launcherilla voit käynnistää Kodi:n käyttöliittymästä mitä tahansa sovelluksia. Käynnistettävistä sovelluksista voi hakea tietoja ja kuvia Internet-tietokannoista.

extension.summary: Launch websites via Chrome in Kiosk-mode

extension.description: Browse and launch all your Steam games from XBMC. Games are automatically added using your library contents. Fanart and images are added for games where available.
extension.disclaimer:
You will need Steam installed and an active web connection to launch games. Currently only supports Windows, however Linux and OS X support should be available soon.
The "VALVe Logo", Valve and Steam are trademarks of Valve Corporation.

extension.summary: ProSieben, Sat.1, Kabel 1 and Sixx media library
Mediathek für ProSieben, Sat.1, Kabel 1 and Sixx
extension.description: Experience with 7TV a majority of shipments of ProSieben, SAT.1, kabel eins and sixx directly after the TV broadcast for free and for at least 7 days in full length - and the round-the-clock!

Erleben Sie mit 7TV einen Großteil der Sendungen von ProSieben, SAT.1, kabel eins und sixx direkt nach der TV-Ausstrahlung kostenlos und für mindestens 7 Tage in voller Länge – und das rund um die Uhr!
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

¡Mira los streams de tus juegos favoritos!

Bekijk je favoriete gaming-streams!

Vimeo ist ein eines der größten Video-Sharing-Websites der Welt.

extension.description: Mit diesem Addon kannst du auf alle angebotenen Streams verschiedenster deutschen Quellen zugreifen.[CR]Website: https://xstream-kodi.github.io[CR]Support: http://xstream-addon.square7.ch
extension.disclaimer: Die von diesem Addon dargestellten Inhalte werden von den Erstellern des Addons weder gehostet oder verbreitet, noch stehen die Ersteller in irgendeiner Beziehung zu den Content-Anbietern.
extension.description: With this addon you can watch all the streams from various german sources.[CR]Website: https://xstream-kodi.github.io[CR]Support: http://xstream-addon.square7.ch
extension.disclaimer: The creators of this addon do not host or distribute any of the content displayed by the addon nor do they have any affiliation with the content providers.
extension.news:
Big THX to all contributors! For more information check out the commit history at GitHub.
xStream v3.3.0 - 18.01.2017 ================================================================================
FIXES… - [dokustream] fix for kategories - [hdfilme] don’t resolve the google-links anymore - [streamdream] fix for series - [tata] fix for series - [tata] fix for genres - [tata] fix links in plugin - [tata] fix useless spaces
NEW… - [general] add the new repo as dependency - [general] add support for remote resolving of streams (e.g. via web interfaces) - [filmpalast] show openload hd as hoster
xStream v3.2.0 - 23.12.2016 ================================================================================
FIXES… - [general] allow default value on 'getsetting' - [general] fix autoplay - [general] fix nextpage for some sites - [general] fix regex for hosterlist - [general] fix sorting - [general] some typo fixes - [general] update gitignore (for the devs) - [general] update local addons after xstream or urlesolver update - [globalsearch] fix errors for many site-plugins - [hoster] fix hosterlist for urls that has no valid url (redirect) - [hoster] some fixes for chostergui - [metahandler] check for exist - [metahandler] fix season greater 10 - [metahandler] fix tmdb - [metahandler] fixed replaced description/plots - [requesthandler] optimize redirect cookie-handlin - [requesthandler] fix error in error-handling - [settings] fix enable after settings change - [updatemanager] fix check - [updatemanager] make foldercheck ignore case
- [bs] avoid consequential error after an api-error - [flimmerstube] use new movie-urls - [hdfilme] fix description in showEntries - [hdfilme] fix „neu hinzugefügt“, „suchen" and „series“ - [hdfilme] hotfix for decoding error - [hdfilme] sort genre - [kinox] fix https hoster - [kinox] fix openload-streams - [meinkino] fixed urls - [movietown] exclude downloads in hosterlist - [movietown] fix requests errors - [mykino] use json for series - [video2k] fix and redesign - [tata] fix gethoster
NEW… - [general] add info to the https/tls error - [general] renew addon-icon and add new color-scheme for icon and fanart - [general] added jdownloader2 support - [general]centralize text cleaning - [general] more common universalresolver detection - [general] update cJsUnpacker - [globalsearch] allow optional parameter for searchterm - [readme] update readme and push most stuff in wiki - [requesthandler] support ignore_discard and ignore_expires on redirect - [requestHanlder] use compression by default - [settings] add seperator to auto create site-plugins - [settings] allow user to disable sites from global-search - [updatemanger] ignore settings.xml - [updatemanager] prevent dialog errors on autoupdate - [utils2] update unescape and add cleanse_text
- [1kino] add new site-plugin - [bs] add genres - [iload] add new site-plugin - [kinodogs] add new site-plugin - [kinox] add 'new' mirros - [movie2z] add new site-plugin - [movie4k] add 'new' mirros - [mykino] add series - [mykino] use json for series - [rapidstream] add new site-plugin - [serienstream.to] redirect on gethosterurl - [tata] new hires-icon
REMOVED… - [general]remove debug-prints - [general] remove except condition in cCFScrape - [general] remove „nextpage" from globalsearch - [logger] remove unnecessary code
- [anime-loads] delete site-plugin - [cineplex] delete site-plugin - [cine-dream] delete offline site-plugin - [kino-streamz] remove "fake" stream - [movie4k] support Stream4k as hoster - [mykino] remove seperate ‚searchentries' for search - [tata.to] remove unnecessary function and unused parameter
xStream v3.1.0 - 17.11.2016 ================================================================================
FIXES… - bs: fixe description error in randomSeason - bs: fix view-error on search - cine: fixed error on playing a stream - flimmerstube: fix error with thumbnails - hdfilme: fix import errors on some devices - moviesever: dont search on empty input - fix errors on global-search at several sites
NEW… - add movietown.org - add streamdream.ws - add view4u.co - change numeric settings to slider - integrate blazingfast into requesthandler - renew screenshots for kodi17 - shrink fanart - update sources, website, summary and description in addon.xml - update logger
REMOVED… - delete offline site-plugin kkiste - move readme to github-wiki - some code cleanup
xStream v3.0.2 - 07.11.2016 ================================================================================
FIXES… - bs.to handle API-Erros - hdfilme.tv fix hoster detection - tata.to fix HTTPS/SSL-Erros - fix an error in the updatemanager that occur if xStream and URLResolver updates at the same time
NEW… - add blazingfast and pyaes support - add meinkino.to
xStream v3.0.0 - 03.11.2016 ================================================================================
FIXES…
Sites: - anime-loads: for different roster responses - bs: fix for openload in hd - bs: rename filename - bs: avoid unnecessary errors - cine: code cleanup - cine: support for language - cineplex: some fixes - Filmpalast: fixes in folder structure - hdfilme: fix search - hdfilme: some cloudflare fixes - hdfilme: support“bluray“ streams - hdfilme: fix server-regex - movie4k: fix series - moviesever: fixed link scraper - seriesever: fix genre-list - seroesever: fix new episodes - tata: seriesnames
UpdateManager: - change beta to stable - change settings to bool - change source for nightly - replaced nightly url - write in binary mode
Other: - fix errors years-filter - fix errors on global-search - fix error on setting the view to early - fix errors with kodi 16 - fix for parseSingleResult - fix problems with viewmodes - general convert methods to staticmethods - optimized fanart for better quality - redesign settings for better usability - replaced gitter badge in readme - redefine string ids for translation - some fixes for ParameterHandler - some next page fixes - switch js2py version - typo fixes and translation in settings - typo fixes in readme - update site-icons and fix for wide-view - user-agent for youtube - more small bugfixes
NEW…
Sites: - dokustreamer.de - flimmerstube.com - kino-streamz.com - mykino.to - serienstream.to - streamit.ws - streamkiste.tv - video2k.is - video4k.to - tata.to
UpdateManager: - added url resolver auto-update - can remove files which are not in repo - fallback if LooseVersion not available - new dialog text for update - new download and sha location - remove beta to stable - remove version.py
Krypton: - add news section for changelog-infos - disclaimer in english and german - new screenshots in addon-info - source and license information
Other: - add pycharm to .gitignore - default-view and an setting for it - many cloudshare changes - optimized fanart for better quality - requestHandler: optional parameter for getCookie - show error if more then one urlresolver - speedup cloudflare scrapping - support for language - support more views and set view for mainmenu - timeout to settings - more small improvements
REMOVED…
Sites: - diefilme.net - gute-filme.to - streamtausch.tv
UpdateManager: - remove source for beta and stable - remove version.py
Other: - some debug logging

extension.description: YouTube is one of the biggest video-sharing websites of the world.
YouTube ist eines der größten Video-Sharing-Websites der Welt.
YouTube jest jednym z największych na świecie serwisów udostępniania wideo.
A YouTube világ egyik legnagyobb videómegosztó weboldala.
YouTube es uno de los mayores sitios web de intercambio de vídeos del mundo.
Данное дополнение позволяет находить и смотреть видео на всеми любимом сайте.
YouTube est l'un des plus grands sites de partage vidéos du monde.
「Youtube」是全世界最大的影片分享網站
YouTube е един от най-големите уеб сайтове за споделяне на видео в целия свят.
Το YouTube είναι μία από τις μεγαλύτερες ιστοσελίδες διαμοιρασμού βίντεο στον κόσμο.
YouTube er en av verdens største nettsider for videodeling.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

extension.description: This is the official Repository of the german Community 'Kodinerds' which you'll find at www.kodinerds.net. Most of the hosted Addons are supported by the members of the Community. Enjoy!

Das ist das offizielle Repository der deutschen Community 'Kodinerds', welche Du unter www.kodinerds.net findest. Die meisten der hier gehosteten Addons werden von den Mitgliedern der Community aktiv supported. Viel Spaß!
tileras addon Repository

Dies ist das offizielle xStream Addon-Verzeichnis.[CR]Bei der Bereitstellung einer neuen Version von xStream wird diese auf Funktionalität geprüft. Sollten dennoch Probleme auftreten benachrichtige bitte das offizielle xStream-Team.
extension.disclaimer: Die dargestellten Inhalte des in diesem Verzeichnis enthaltenen Addons werden von den Erstellern des Addons weder gehostet oder verbreitet, noch stehen die Ersteller in irgendeiner Beziehung zu den Content-Anbietern.

extension.summary: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi.
extension.description: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi, simplify addon development of video plugins requiring multi video hosts.

extension.summary: Install add-ons from the SuperRepo All Repository
Installeer add-ons uit de SuperRepo All Repository
Inštalácia add-ons zo SuperRepo All Repozitár
Installation von Addons aus dem SuperRepo All Repository
Instale add-ons do SuperRepo All Repositório
Instale add-ons do SuperRepo All Repositório
extension.description: Download and install add-ons for Kodi in the category "All" using SuperRepo.[CR][CR]By using SuperRepo repositories you will be able to take advantage of our serverside dependency checking, extensive file mirror service and many more.[CR]Visit our website at https://superrepo.org/ to browse the add-ons, create personal addon bundles and install whole bundles at once![CR][CR]

Download and installeer add-ons voor Kodi in de categorie "All" via SuperRepo.[CR]Door SuperRepo te installeren kunt u profiteren van onze controle van add-ons en ons uitgebreide server netwerk. Bezoek onze website op https://superrepo.org om door de add-ons te bladeren, persoonlijke add-on bundels te maken en complete bundels in 1 keer te installeren![CR][CR]

Preber a inštaluj add-ons do kategórie "All" z SuperRepo.org add-on repozitár.[CR][CR]Ak si našiel add-on ktorý je poškodený alebo nefunkčný, alebo chceš pridať nový add-on, potom prosím pozri na https://superrepo.org/[CR][CR]Repozitár je udržiavaný komunitou Kodi a za pomoci SuperRepo Wiki, a tento preberá add-ons z rôznych zdrojov. Vzhľadom na to, SuperRepo nenesie žiadnu zodpovednosť za služby poskytované týmito add-ons.[CR][CR]Rozšírený repozitár vyvinul Bart Otten[CR][CR]

Lade und installiere Addons der Kategorie "All" aus dem SuperRepo.org Addon Repository.[CR][CR]Möchtest du ein fehlerhaftes Addon melden oder ein neues Addon vorschlagen, kannst du dies über unsere Webseite http://superrepo.org tun.[CR][CR]Das Repository wird mit Hilfe des SuperRepo Wiki durch die Kodi Community gepflegt und durch unseren Generator aus mehreren Quellen zusammengestellt. Daher übernimmt SuperRepo keinerlei Verantwortung für diesen Service.[CR][CR]Der"eXtended Reposity Generator" wird durch Bart Otten entwickelt.[CR][CR]

Baixe e instale o add-ons na categoria "All" do Repositório SuperRepo.org. [CR] [CR] Se você encontrar um add-on quebrado ou não funcionando, ou você gostaria de incluir um outro, por favor visite https://superrepo.org/ [CR] [CR]O repositório é mantida pela comunidade do Kodi usando o Wiki do SuperRepo e o nosso gerador de busca de add-ons múltiplas fontes. Portanto SuperRepo não aceita qualquer responsabilidade por esse serviço.[CR][CR]O Gerador Reposity eXtended é desenvolvido por Bart Otten[CR][CR]

Baixe e instale o add-ons na categoria "All" do Repositório SuperRepo.org. [CR] [CR] Se você encontrar um add-on quebrado ou não funcionando, ou você gostaria de incluir um outro, por favor visite https://superrepo.org/ [CR][CR]O repositório é mantida pela comunidade do Kodi usando o Wiki do SuperRepo e o nosso gerador de busca de add-ons múltiplas fontes. Portanto SuperRepo não aceita qualquer responsabilidade por esse serviço.[CR][CR]O Gerador Reposity eXtended é desenvolvido por Bart Otten[CR][CR]
extension.disclaimer: The SuperRepo generator fetches addons from multiple sources. Therefore SuperRepo accepts no responsibility for included addons.[CR]
De SuperRepo generator verzamelt addons van verschillende bronnen. Daarom accepteert SuperRepo geen enkele verantwoordelijkheid voor de ingevoegde addons.[CR]

Repozitár je udržiavaný komunitou Kodi a za pomoci SuperRepo Wiki, a tento preberá addons z rôznych zdrojov. Vzhľadom na to, SuperRepo nenesie žiadnu zodpovednosť za služby poskytované týmito addons.[CR]

Das Repository wird durch die Kodi Community gepflegt und durch unseren Generator aus mehreren Quellen zusammengestellt. Daher übernimmt SuperRepo keinerlei Verantwortung für die enthaltenen Addons.[CR]
O repositório é mantido pela comunidade comunidade do Kodi e o nosso gerador de busca de addons de múltiplas fontes. Portanto SuperRepo aceita não se responsabiliza por addons incluídos.[CR]
O repositório é mantido pela comunidade comunidade do Kodi e o nosso gerador de busca de addons de múltiplas fontes. Portanto SuperRepo aceita não se responsabiliza por addons incluídos.[CR]
